org.gatein.api

Interface Portal


  • public interface Portal
    The main interface of the portal public API. This is available from the PortalRequest object which can be obtained from PortalRequest.getInstance().
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli, Stian Thorgersen

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getSite

        Site getSite(SiteId siteId)
        Returns a site given the SiteId. Can return null if the site does not exist.
        Parameters:
        siteId - the siteId
        Returns:
        the site or null if the site does not exist
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if siteId is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • createSite

        Site createSite(SiteId siteId)
        Creates a a site given the SiteId. This site is not saved until saveSite(org.gatein.api.site.Site) is called. Will use the default site template configured by the portal.
        Parameters:
        siteId - the site id
        Returns:
        the new site which has not been saved yet.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if siteId is null
        EntityAlreadyExistsException - if the site already exists
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • createSite

        Site createSite(SiteId siteId,
              String templateName)
        Creates a a site given the SiteId. This site is not saved until saveSite(org.gatein.api.site.Site) is called.
        Parameters:
        siteId - the site id
        templateName - the name of the template to use to create the site
        Returns:
        the new site which has not been saved yet.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if siteId is null
        EntityAlreadyExistsException - if the site already exists
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • findSites

        List<Site> findSites(SiteQuery query)
        Finds sites given the SiteQuery
        Parameters:
        query - the site query
        Returns:
        list of sites found. The list will be empty if no sites were found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if query is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • saveSite

        void saveSite(Site site)
        Saves a site
        Parameters:
        site - the site to save
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if site is null
        ApiException - if an exception occurred trying to save the site

      • removeSite

        boolean removeSite(SiteId siteId)
        Removes a site
        Parameters:
        siteId - the id of the site to remove
        Returns:
        true if the site was removed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if siteId is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • getNavigation

        Navigation getNavigation(SiteId siteId)
        Returns the navigation of a site given the SiteId. Can return null if the navigation does not exist.
        Parameters:
        siteId - the site id
        Returns:
        navigation for a site, or null if the navigation does not exist
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if siteId is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • getPage

        Page getPage(PageId pageId)
        Returns the page of a site given the PageId. Can return null if the page does not exist.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the page id
        Returns:
        the page or null if the page does not exist
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pageId is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • createPage

        Page createPage(PageId pageId)
        Creates a page for a site given the PageId. This page is not saved until savePage(org.gatein.api.page.Page) is called.
        Parameters:
        pageId - the page id
        Returns:
        the new page which has not been saved yet.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pageId is null
        EntityAlreadyExistsException - if the page already exists
        EntityNotFoundException - if the site does not exist
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • findPages

        List<Page> findPages(PageQuery query)
        Finds pages given the PageQuery
        Parameters:
        query - the page query
        Returns:
        list of pages found. List is empty if no pages were found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if query is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • savePage

        void savePage(Page page)
        Saves a page
        Parameters:
        page - the page to save
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if page is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • removePage

        boolean removePage(PageId pageId)
        Removes a page
        Parameters:
        pageId - the id of the page to remove
        Returns:
        true if the page was removed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if pageId is null
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(User user,
                    Permission permission)
        Returns true if the given user has the rights represented by the permission
        Parameters:
        user - the user
        permission - the permission
        Returns:
        true if the user has rights represented by the permission
        Throws:
        ApiException - if something prevented this operation to succeed
